title: CSAV-Based Collaborative Learning Design for Enhancing Critical Thinking Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic argumentative structures and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Collaborative Learning Environment Focused on Enhancing Critical Analysis Skills Regarding Social Issues for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and systematically analyze complex social issues using argumentation structures with the CSAV tool.
Through collaborative activities, learners can apply sub-elements of critical thinking, such as hypothesis verification, problem-solving, and argument evaluation.
Learners can design strategies to promote critical thinking applicable to actual educational settings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
